snippet: Stu Jackson will step down as executive vice president for basketball operations at the N.B.A., and Rod Thorn will return as president for basketball operations, the league said.
abstract: NBA announces that Stu Jackson will step down as executive vice president for basketball operations at the National Basketball Assn and Rod Thorn will return as president for basketball operations.
lead_paragraph: Stu Jackson will step down as executive vice president for basketball operations at the N.B.A., and Rod Thorn will return as president for basketball operations, the league said.

headline.main: Jackson Is Leaving Job at N.B.A.; Thorn Will Return
